GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
RDMA/hns: Fix incorrect clearing of interrupt status register

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 94569c55422a5df31851b43b3c892631b541191c, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit a5073d6054f75d7c94b3354206eec4b804d2fbd4. For more details please see the references link.
